name: rikurou

normalized: (can i not even protect… the people most important to me…?

name: rikurou
normalized: (annerose…)
everything's getting hazy.
and then.
i hear a voice.
annerose's voice.

name: annerose
normalized: pain is a limiter.
a mechanism that tells people their limits.

name: annerose
normalized: so then what is an immortal?
assuming death lies at the limits of pain, what does that make an immortal who can gobeyond that?

name: annerose
normalized: being able to transcend those limits is the true essence of an immortal.
transcend the limits.
the limits of pain.
the limits of humanity.
the limits of "me.
now is the time i want to go beyond the limits.
i want the strength to defeat all enemies.
and speed faster than anyone!
and the fortitude to protect those important to me!
and the courage to never lose hope until the very end!
i want to go beyond the limits!
beyond pain, beyond humanity, beyond who i've been until now…
to become a true immortal!

name: rikurou
normalized: (annerose!

normalized: (aagghh!

name: rikurou
normalized: guoohh!

my power!
i open my eyes.

i feel her eyes telling me "go.

name: rikurou
normalized: (got it!
i spring up in an instant.

the unnerved assassins surrounding me go to finish me off with their claws.

name: rikurou
normalized: oohh!
blind, killing fury fills the pit of my gut.
i give myself over to it with a crystal clear mind as i move my body.
it becomes an instantaneous punch,
an instantaneous elbow,
an instantaneous kick,
and the assassins lose their lives.
the three that had me surrounded vanish from my sight.
they probably didn't even know what happened to them.
they exploded the moment they took my attacks, spraying dozens of meters away and making three bloody stains on the wall.

name: rikurou
normalized: oohh!
oohh!

name: rikurou
normalized: (i-it huurts!
pain like i've never felt before assaults me.
my body's screaming from these movements far surpassing human limitations.
my fist is shattered, my elbow's broken, and my leg's twisted off at a weird angle.
but each of those injuries heal in turn with lightning speed from my immortal power.
i stare with scarily clear awareness at my body, repairing and destroying itself at a dizzying rate.

name: rikurou
normalized: (so this is the power of an immortal…)
i understand now what annerose said, that immortals are the ones to surpass the limits.
now with my body free of all limiters, i've obtained the double-edged power of surpassing the limits of the flesh.

name: rikurou
normalized: (this strength won't last for long.
that's what my reason not as an immortal, but as a human tells me.

name: rikurou
normalized: (four more left!

name: rikurou
normalized: aahh!

not a moment's vacillation at being cut down by each others' claws -- a secret killing technique meant for certain death by sacrificing one's allies.

name: rikurou
normalized: out of my waayy!
